summary: A new AnalyticsMockSection was added and inserted immediately before AsciiKarmSection on the landing page, using existing glass styling and SnowDotsBackground. Reduced-motion support was added to SnowDotsBackground. However, due to truncation of the new section file, it is not fully evidenced that the required fake stats (with English labels and exact values) are actually rendered to the user.

missing_requirements.requirement: Display fake (hard-coded) stats in the new analytics block: Level = 23, Karm = 82800, Habits = 4, Challenges = 24, with English labels.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the stats object is defined (level/karm/habits/challenges), but the provided truncated content does not show any JSX that actually renders the four labeled values to the page.

hallucinated_features.description: Interactive 3D flip card/deck behavior (delayed card flip, deck expanded toggle/blur overlay).
hallucinated_features.reason: The request asked for a blended analytics-style mockup resembling the RN layout, but did not request timed flip animations, 3D transforms, or an expandable deck interaction.
evidence: frontend/src/index.css (mentions new 3D card flip utilities per summary)

hallucinated_features.description: Global/premium CTA styling and glow/animation utilities unrelated to the analytics insertion.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on inserting an analytics mock block above the ASCII KARM section; additional CTA glow styling and other global animation utilities are not requested as part of these requirements.
